comment.author: 57025016@N06
comment._content: Very like it but not it....there are late 19th century photos in existence of the corner house which you have shown on google maps which clearly shows the same front porch above the front door yet there is no porch on the house in the photo above. The house above is "The Red House" which is located further down Hill St (house not visible on google map but I have shown the driveway to The Red House here: maps.google.co.uk/maps?hl=en&ie=UTF8&layer=c&...
